Module Contents

.. py:class:: PyiDocumenter(*args: Any)

   Bases: :py:obj:`sphinx.ext.autodoc.ModuleDocumenter`


   Specialised Documenter subclass for .pyi files.


   .. py:attribute:: objtype
      :value: 'pyi'



   .. py:attribute:: directivetype
      :value: 'module'



   .. py:attribute:: priority


   .. py:method:: can_document_member(member, membername, isattr, parent)
      :classmethod:


      Called to see if a member can be documented by this Documenter.
